snippet: What underlying issues affect some households’ ability to clean and maintain their living spaces?
lead_paragraph: In any home, some cleaning-related tasks spark dread in some members of the household, while others don’t mind them at all. For example, one person might detest emptying the dishwasher, and therefore, complete other chores that he or she likes more, or at least is willing to do.
abstract: What underlying issues affect some households’ ability to clean and maintain their living spaces?

headline.main: How Important Is Keeping a Clean House?
